frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-lock-keys
frozen.shortDescription: Numlock and Capslock status on the panel. Icons are auto hidden. Simplified with no menus, notifications or settings.
frozen.longDescription:
Numlock and Capslock status on the panel. Icons are auto hidden. Simplified with no menus, notifications or settings.

Wayland is only supported for Gnome Shell 3.38.
